error.message: Class Drupal\Tests\select_icons\FunctionalJavascript\SelectIconsElementIntegrationTest extends deprecated class Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\JavascriptTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead
Call to method setUp() of deprecated class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead

The 'selecticons' library is depending on a deprecated library. The "core/jquery.ui.selectmenu" asset library is deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3067969
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to select_icons.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
